components.title: HTML Form Backend
components.description: Making your HTML forms work has never been more straightforward. Just point your form to our endpoint and start getting submissions in a matter of minutes. As a power user, you get complete control over the look and feel of your web form.

heroImage.imageAlt: Survey Form

title.text: Easy form endpoints for your HTML forms

header.title: HTML Form Backend
header.description: Design a form for your site, and be sure to name all the fields. Then, just point the action to us and confirm your email address after submission.
header.code:
<form accept-charset='UTF-8' action="https://app.formester.com/forms/your@form/submissions" method="POST" >
     <label for="email">Email </label>
     <input type="email" id="email-address" name="email" placeholder="your@email.com" />
     <button type="submit">Submit </button>
 </form>

steps.title: 1. Connect Your Form
steps.description: Pointing the action-attribute of your form to our URL will enable submissions to be sent to your email address.

steps.title: 2. Add Name Attributes
steps.description: Include a name attribute in all form elements (i.e. <input>, <select>, and <textarea>) to receive the submission data.
steps.code: <input type="email" name="email" />

steps.title: 3. Submit and Confirm
steps.description: Submit the form and get the submissions details on your dashboard.

title.text: How does HTML Form Backend Help?

itemList.title: Complete Control
itemList.description: For those who like to take control, never again worry about your form not blending perfectly with your website. You do the styling and use our form endpoint to start receiving submissions.

itemList.title: Easy Embedding
itemList.description: Have a form up and running on your website quickly and with minimal coding. Select an existing template, modify it to match your brand theme, add your required data fields and paste our link on your webpage. Simple?

itemList.title: Realtime Notifications
itemList.description: On new submissions, Formester ensures that you get informed in real-time for you to stay on top of what's essential for your business. Notifications are delivered where they matter - Slack, email or 100+ apps.

itemList.title: Own Your Data
itemList.description: We offer zero-friction data import & export. If you decide to move on, you can take everything with you. We also provide guided migration from other tools. Our team will ensure the transition is seamless.

title.text: How to create an online form with Formester in 3 simple steps

itemList.title: Create a Custom Form
itemList.description: Open the online form maker in Formester. Decide if you want to start with a blank page or use one of the available pre-designed templates. Combine blocks to create a survey, quiz, registration form, online order form, or any other custom web form. Add standard fields like Name, Email, Phone, Date, Text Input, or File Upload by simply dragging and dropping these blocks into your form. Create multiple choice questions, drop-down lists, ratings, and scales – all with just a few clicks. Once your questions are ready, open the form designer. Choose a built-in form design theme that suits your preferences. Customize the colors, fonts, and buttons until you achieve a web form design that truly represents your brand! That's it – your form is ready.
itemList.description_markdown:
Open the online form maker in Formester. Decide if you want to start with a blank page or use one of the available **[pre-designed templates](/templates/)**. 

Combine blocks to create a survey, quiz, registration form, online order form, or any other custom web form. Add standard fields like Name, Email, Phone, Date, Text Input, or File Upload by simply dragging and dropping these blocks into your form. 

Create multiple choice questions, drop-down lists, ratings, and scales – all with just a few clicks. Once your questions are ready, open the form designer. 

Choose a built-in form design theme that suits your preferences. Customize the colors, fonts, and buttons until you achieve a web form design that truly represents your brand!

itemList.title: Publish and Share
itemList.description: Activate the form in the Publish section so that people can view and fill it out. Now let everyone access your online form: Add the link to the form page to a button on your website. Alternatively, share a direct link to your form on social networks. If you need a website form, use the embed code that is automatically generated by Formester's website form creator. Simply copy and paste it to the desired web page – no HTML coding required. Whichever sharing method you choose, there's no need to set up any additional server integrations. Everything will be processed through Formester's software.

itemList.title: Attach a Submission Copy
itemList.description:
If you want to send respondents a copy of their form submission along with the autoresponse email, follow these steps:
Go to the "Advanced" section in the autoresponder settings.
Toggle on "Send the submitter a copy of their submission."
Once enabled, Formester will attach a detailed copy of their submitted responses to the email.
This feature is useful for confirmations, receipts, or keeping respondents informed about their entries.
itemList.description_markdown:
If you want to send respondents a copy of their form submission along with the autoresponse email, follow these steps:


- Go to the **Advanced** section in the autoresponder settings.

- Toggle on **Send the submitter a copy of their submission.**

- Once enabled, Formester will attach a detailed copy of their submitted responses to the email.

This feature is useful for confirmations, receipts, or keeping respondents informed about their entries.

cardImage.imageAlt: a screenshot of sending submission pdf copy in email autoresponder in formester

image.name: a screenshot of sending submission pdf copy in email autoresponder in formester.svg
image.alternativeText: a screenshot of sending submission pdf copy in email autoresponder in formester
image.caption: a screenshot of sending submission pdf copy in email autoresponder in formester

itemList.title: Add a Time Delay
itemList.description:
Want to delay the autoresponse instead of sending it immediately?
Navigate to the "Advanced" section and locate the "Delay Time" option.
Set a delay ranging from a few minutes to several days.
This is perfect for:
Sending reminders after a certain period.
Avoiding immediate follow-ups for better engagement.
Scheduling responses at the right time.
For example, if a respondent fills out a feedback form, you can delay the email by 24 hours to ensure they receive it at an optimal time.
itemList.description_markdown:
Want to delay the autoresponse instead of sending it immediately?

- Navigate to the **Advanced** section and locate the **Delay Time** option.

- Set a delay ranging from a few minutes to several days.

**This is perfect for:**

- Sending reminders after a certain period.

- Avoiding immediate follow-ups for better engagement.

- Scheduling responses at the right time.

**For example**, if a respondent fills out a feedback form, you can delay the email by **24 hours** to ensure they receive it at an optimal time.

image.caption: a screenshot of adding time delay for email autoresponder in formester

itemList.title: Set Conditional Rules for Autoresponse
itemList.description:
Want to trigger emails only when certain conditions are met?
Use the "Rules" option to define conditions based on the respondent’s input.
The email will only be sent if the responses meet your set criteria.
Examples:
Send a different confirmation email based on the respondent’s selected service.
Only send follow-up emails if the respondent chooses “Interested in a demo.”
Trigger personalized emails based on survey responses.
By setting up conditions, you can create a more targeted and relevant email experience for your users.
itemList.description_markdown:
Want to trigger emails only when certain conditions are met?

- Use the **Rules** option to define conditions based on the respondent’s input.

- The email will only be sent if the responses meet your set criteria.

**Examples:**

- Send a **different** confirmation email based on the respondent’s selected service.

- Only send follow-up emails if the respondent chooses **Interested in a demo.**

- Trigger personalized emails based on survey responses.

By setting up conditions, you can create a more **targeted and relevant** email experience for your users.

faqList.header: What spam protection options does Formester offer for my forms?
faqList.body: Formester provides multiple spam protection tools, including reCAPTCHA, honeypot integration, invisible reCAPTCHA, and AI-based spam detection. These tools work together to ensure your forms are protected from unwanted submissions.

faqList.header: How does invisible reCAPTCHA work in Formester?
faqList.body: Invisible reCAPTCHA runs quietly in the background, analyzing user behavior to differentiate between bots and humans. It provides seamless protection without requiring users to complete a CAPTCHA challenge, ensuring a smooth experience.

faqList.header: What is the honeypot integration, and how does it stop spam?
faqList.body: Honeypot integration adds hidden fields to your form that bots are likely to fill in, but human users won’t see. If these fields are filled out, the form submission is flagged as spam and automatically blocked.

faqList.header: How does Formester’s AI spam protection help prevent unwanted submissions?
faqList.body: Formester’s AI spam protection analyzes form submissions in real-time using machine learning to detect and block suspicious activity. The AI adapts to new spam tactics, providing a constantly improving layer of defense.

faqList.header: Can I use multiple spam protection methods on the same form?
faqList.body: Yes! You can combine reCAPTCHA, honeypot, invisible reCAPTCHA, and AI spam protection for maximum security. This multi-layered approach ensures that your forms are safeguarded from both automated bots and sophisticated spam attempts.

title.text: How does Web Form Analytics help?

itemList.title: Knowing Your Customers
itemList.description: Filter data by traffic source, device, location, browser, and other important metrics. Use the best form analytics software to analyze user behavior and statistics over time.

itemList.title: Prevent form abandonment
itemList.description: Long or irrelevant questions cause form abandonment. Advanced web form metrics pinpoint drop-off spots, helping you optimize and reduce abandonment rate.

itemList.title: Track and analyze your traffic
itemList.description: View where visitors come from, how they interact with your forms, and the platforms and devices they use. This helps you answer questions like how effective your lead generation strategy is.

itemList.title: Provide critical insight
itemList.description: Conversion rate matters. Low completion rate means high views but little users interaction, signaling long questions or room for improvement. A higher rate shows your online form works as intended.

itemList.title: Accessing Form Responses
itemList.description:
To view responses, navigate to the Results tab. Under the Submissions section, you’ll see all collected responses organized in a clear, table format. This ensures you can quickly review the details of each submission.

**Each response includes:**

**Submission Date & Time:** Know when a user completed the form.

**Time Taken:** Track how long it took the respondent to fill out the form.

**IP Address:** Get insights into the user's location and activity.

**Visible Form Fields:** See exactly what the respondent interacted with.

itemList.title: Metrics You Can Track
itemList.description:

- **Number of Views:** The total times your form has been viewed.

- **Total Submissions:** The number of users who completed and submitted the form.

- **Completion Rate:** The percentage of users who finished filling out the form.

- **Drop-Off Rate:** The percentage of users who started the form but didn’t complete it.

title.text: How to create an online form with Formester in 3 simple steps

itemList.title: Create a Custom Form
itemList.description: Open the online form maker in Formester. Decide if you want to start with a blank page or use one of the available pre-designed templates. Combine blocks to create a survey, quiz, registration form, online order form, or any other custom web form. Add standard fields like Name, Email, Phone, Date, Text Input, or File Upload by simply dragging and dropping these blocks into your form. Create multiple choice questions, drop-down lists, ratings, and scales – all with just a few clicks. Once your questions are ready, open the form designer. faqList.header: What is the information recall, and how does it work?
faqList.body: The information recall feature allows you to use the @ sign to pull responses from previous fields into new fields or emails. This lets you automatically populate data based on earlier answers, streamlining the form-filling process.

faqList.header: Can I recall information into multiple fields or emails?
faqList.body: Yes! You can use the @ sign to recall information into any number of fields or emails, making it easy to create personalized messages or forms that include relevant data from earlier responses.

faqList.header: Is the recalled information accurate and up to date?
faqList.body: Absolutely! The feature retrieves the most recent responses submitted by the user, ensuring that the information is accurate and reflects the latest input.

faqList.header: How to enable the information recall?
faqList.body: No special setup is needed! Simply use the @ sign followed by the field name wherever you want to recall information, and the feature will automatically fetch the corresponding response when the form is filled out.

faqList.header: How do offline forms work?
faqList.body: Offline forms allow you to collect data even when you're not connected to the internet. This means you can use them in remote locations, on-site visits, or during events with unreliable connectivity. Once you're back online, the data is securely synced to your device.

faqList.header: What are the benefits of using offline forms?
faqList.body: Offline forms offer several advantages, including:

list.text: Increased productivity: Eliminate delays caused by slow or unavailable internet connections.
Enhanced data security: Protect sensitive information by storing it locally until it's safely synced.
Improved accessibility: Reach users in areas with limited or no internet access.
Reduced costs: Eliminate data charges and dependency on internet providers.

faqList.header: What types of businesses can benefit from offline forms?
faqList.body: Offline forms can be valuable for a wide range of industries, including:

list.text: Field service: Collect data during inspections, repairs, or installations.
Construction: Capture site information, progress reports, and safety checklists.
Healthcare: Conduct patient surveys, health assessments, or clinical research.
Events: Gather registrations, feedback, or surveys at conferences, trade shows, or festivals.
Retail: Enable offline transactions or customer surveys in stores.

title.text: Create your first form for free

faqList.header: What does "partial submission" mean?
faqList.body: Partial submission is when a user begins filling out a form but doesn't finish or send it. The form builder saves the information entered by the user until they stop, preventing any data loss.

faqList.header: How does the Partial Submissions feature work?
faqList.body: This feature saves information entered in a form automatically, even if the user doesn't complete it. You can view and examine incomplete-form responses. This helps you recover lost data. It also allows you to see where users are having difficulties.

faqList.header: Can I view partial submissions in real time?
faqList.body: Yes, you can access partial submissions in real time. When a user starts filling out a form, their answers are saved and can be seen, even if they don’t finish the form. This ensures you don’t miss out on any data as it’s being entered.

faqList.header: What happens if a user finishes the form after partial submission?
faqList.body: If a user returns to the form after abandoning their form, the Formester will update the saved entry. It will replace it with the final data they submit. This means you should replace a partially submitted form with a fully completed one. This will ensure that you have the most accurate and current information.

faqList.header: Is there a limit to how many incomplete forms I can view?
faqList.body: No, there’s no limit on the number of incomplete forms you can view. You can view all partial submissions. It doesn't matter how many there are. This gives you a complete view of how users interact with your forms.

title.text: Why Export Form Submissions as PDF Files?

itemList.title: Document Management
itemList.description: Convert form submissions into PDFs for easy storage and organization. PDFs are universally accessible, simplifying form management.

itemList.title: Sharing Submissions
itemList.description: PDFs make sharing form responses easy via email and other platforms, improving communication and simplifying data exchange.

itemList.title: Data Security
itemList.description: Store form responses as PDFs for secure and stable data, preventing unwanted edits and ensuring reliability.

itemList.title: Record-Keeping
itemList.description: Maintain a permanent, easily accessible record of all submissions. PDFs are ideal for archiving and retrieving historical data.

title.text: How to Export Submissions as PDFs?

itemList.description: Once your form gets responses, go to the “Results” tab, then “Submissions”, and select the submissions you want to export as PDFs.

itemList.title: Step 3: Export as PDF
itemList.description: Once you’ve selected the submissions, Click on the “PDF icon” under “Submitted At”. This will convert the form entry and will show up as a PDF document.

components.title: Form Limiter
components.description: Setup Date, Time and Submission Limits on your Online Forms & Surveys!

heroImage.imageAlt: a screenshot of formester's form limiter ui

components.description:
Form Limiter is a powerful feature in Formester that lets you control the availability of your online forms for submissions. 

With Form Limiter, you can easily set time and response limits, making sure that your forms are only accessible when you want them to be.

heroImage.imageAlt: an illustration of partial submission

itemList.title: Set a Time Limit
itemList.description: Make sure your form is accessible only during a set time, ideal for time-sensitive surveys or event registrations.

itemList.title: Limit Responses
itemList.description: Decide how many responses you want by setting a submission limit. Avoid getting more entries than you can manage.

itemList.title: Avoid Manual Management
itemList.description: Save time and effort by letting Form Limiter close your forms once they reach the time or response limit you’ve set.

itemList.title: Keep Data Consistent
itemList.description: Collect responses within a specific period, which helps you gather more consistent and reliable data.

title.text: How to Use the Form Limiter?

itemList.title: Step 1: Access the Form Limiter
itemList.description: Once your form or survey is ready, hit “Publish”. It will bring up a UI where you can access the “Set Time and Response Limits” Option.
itemList.description_markdown: Once your form or survey is ready, hit **“Publish”**. It will bring up a UI where you can access the **“Set Time and Response Limits”** Option.

components.title: Save and Resume Submission From Any Device
components.description: Let respondents save and resume their submission anytime, from any device, with a unique link.

heroImage.imageAlt: a mockup of formester's save and continue feature

image.name: a mockup of formester's save and continue feature.svg
image.alternativeText: a mockup of formester's save and continue feature
image.caption: a mockup of formester's save and continue feature

itemList.title: Never lose progress
itemList.description: Users can pause form-filling anytime and return later without starting over, saving time and effort.
itemList.description_markdown: Users can pause form-filling anytime and return later without starting over, saving time and effort.

itemList.title: Access From Any Device
itemList.description: Since data is stored securely in Formester’s database, users can resume on any device, anytime.
itemList.description_markdown: Since data is stored securely in Formester’s database, users can resume on any device, anytime.

itemList.title: Avoid frustration
itemList.description: Long forms can be overwhelming, saving progress ensures users don’t abandon forms due to time constraints.
itemList.description_markdown: Long forms can be overwhelming, saving progress ensures users don’t abandon forms due to time constraints.

itemList.title: Secure Email Backup
itemList.description: Users receive their unique save link via email, reducing the risk of losing access to their saved responses.
itemList.description_markdown: Users receive their unique save link via email, reducing the risk of losing access to their saved responses.

itemList.title: Toggle On Save & Resume
itemList.description:
- Navigate to the **Settings** tab in the Formester dashboard.

- Go to **Advanced Settings**,

- Find the **Save & Resume** option, and toggle it On.

- Click **Save Settings** to apply changes, then publish your form.

After enabling this feature, respondents will see a **Save & Resume Later** button at the bottom. Selecting it generates a unique URL, which they can copy and use to return and complete the form anytime.

The **[incomplete submission](/features/partial-submissions/)** will be stored in Formester’s database and not in the local device, so the user can resume their submission from a different device.
itemList.description_markdown:
- Navigate to the **Settings** tab in the Formester dashboard.

- Go to **Advanced Settings**,

- Find the **Save & Resume** option, and toggle it On.

- Click **Save Settings** to apply changes, then publish your form.

After enabling this feature, respondents will see a **Save & Resume Later** button at the bottom. Selecting it generates a unique URL, which they can copy and use to return and complete the form anytime.

The **[incomplete submission](/features/partial-submissions/)** will be stored in Formester’s database and not in the local device, so the user can resume their submission from a different device.

cardImage.imageAlt: a mockup of formester's save and continue feature

image.name: a mockup of formester's save and continue feature.svg
image.alternativeText: a mockup of formester's save and continue feature
image.caption: a mockup of formester's save and continue feature

itemList.title: Email the Save & Resume Link
itemList.description:
- Click the Settings icon next to the **Save & Resume** feature.

- Set up your **SMTP integration** to enable email delivery.

- Customize the Email Subject and Email Body as needed.

- Click Done, then Save Settings to apply changes.

Now, when respondents select **Save & Resume Later**, they’ll be prompted to enter their email address. The unique resume link will be sent to their inbox, ensuring they don’t lose access and can easily return to complete the form.

title.text: Create your first form for free

faqList.header: How does the save and continue feature work?
faqList.body: It automatically saves the respondent’s progress, allowing them to resume the form later from where they left off.

faqList.header: Will my saved progress be lost if I switch devices?
faqList.body: No, since submissions are saved in Formester’s database, you can resume from any device.
faqList.body_markdown: No, since submissions are saved in Formester’s database, you can resume from any device.

faqList.header: How long does the save link remain active?
faqList.body: The link remains valid until the form is completed or manually deleted by the creator.
faqList.body_markdown: The link remains valid until the form is completed or manually deleted by the creator.

faqList.header: Is the saved data secure?
faqList.body: Yes, all data is stored securely in Formester’s system, not on the respondent’s device.

faqList.header: What if someone loses the link?
faqList.body: If the email option is enabled, they can retrieve it from their inbox. Otherwise, they must start over.

faqList.header: Does this work for all Formester forms?
faqList.body: Yes! Any form where the feature is enabled will support save and resume.

faqList.header: Can respondents share their save link with someone else?
faqList.body: Yes, but only the person with the link can continue the submission.
faqList.body_markdown: Yes, but only the person with the link can continue the submission.

faqList.header: Is there a limit to how many times a respondent can save and resume?
faqList.body: No, respondents can save and resume as many times as needed until the form is completed.

title.text: Why Use the File Upload Field?

itemList.title: Gather All Types of Files
itemList.description: Respondents can submit documents, photos, and other files directly through the form, saving you time and effort by keeping everything in one place.

title.text: How to Use the File Upload Field?

faqList.header: What are calculation fields?
faqList.body: Calculation fields allow you to automate math within your form. Whether it's adding totals in a payment form or estimating costs in a calculator form, they perform complex calculations instantly based on user inputs.

faqList.header: How do I build a formula in the calculation field?
faqList.body: It’s simple! Use @ signs to pull data from other fields. For example, you could use @price * @quantity to calculate the total cost. The form will do the rest of the math for you.

faqList.header: Can I customize the appearance of the calculation field?
faqList.body: Absolutely! You can customize the label and adjust the format of the results to fit the design of your form. Whether it’s currency, percentages, or plain numbers, you can format it accordingly.

faqList.header: Are calculation fields hard to set up for beginners?
faqList.body: No, they’re easy to use! Just follow the step-by-step process: add the field, create your formula using @ signs, customize the label, and save. It’s beginner-friendly and takes only minutes to set up.

faqList.header: What should I do if my formula doesn’t work correctly?
faqList.body: If you run into trouble, check if the @ references are pointing to the correct fields and verify that your formulas are set up correctly. Double-check the field names to ensure they match your formula inputs.

faqList.header: How to Enter HTML Code for a Form Calculator
faqList.body: You can easily embed the HTML code for a calculator form into your website. After creating your form in Formester, simply grab the embed code provided. Then, paste the HTML code into the section of your website where you want the form calculator to appear. This works seamlessly across most website builders and CMS platforms, letting you add interactive forms with ease.

title.text: How to Make an Online Form with Formester in 3 Easy Steps

itemList.title: Create a Custom Form
itemList.description: Open the online form maker in Formester. Decide if you want to start with a blank page or use one of the available pre-designed templates. Combine blocks to create a survey, quiz, registration form, online order form, or any other custom web form. Add standard fields like Name, Email, Phone, Date, Text Input, or File Upload by simply dragging and dropping these blocks into your form. Create multiple choice questions, drop-down lists, ratings, and scales – all with just a few clicks. Once your questions are ready, open the form designer. Choose a built-in form design theme that suits your preferences. Customize the colors, fonts, and buttons until you achieve a web form design that truly represents your brand! That's it – your form is ready.
itemList.description_markdown:
Open the **[online form builder](/online-form-builder/)** in Formester. Decide if you want to start with a blank page or use one of the available pre-designed templates.

Combine blocks to create a survey, quiz, registration form, online order form, or any other custom web form. 

Add standard fields like Name, Email, Phone, Date, Text Input, or File Upload by simply dragging and dropping these blocks into your form. 

Create multiple choice questions, drop-down lists, ratings, and scales – all with just a few clicks. Once your questions are ready, open the form designer. 

Choose a built-in form design theme that suits your preferences. Customize the colors, fonts, and buttons until you achieve a web form design that truly represents your brand!

itemList.title: Publish and Share
itemList.description: Activate the form in the Publish section so that people can view and fill it out. Now let everyone access your online form: Add the link to the form page to a button on your website. Alternatively, share a direct link to your form on social networks. faqList.header: What is conditional logic, and how does it work in your forms?
faqList.body: Conditional logic allows you to create dynamic forms that change based on user responses. For example, if a user selects "Yes" to a question, you can show them additional fields related to that answer, making the form more relevant and user-friendly.

faqList.header: Is it easy to set up conditional logic, or do I need technical skills?
faqList.body: Setting up conditional logic is straightforward! Our intuitive drag-and-drop interface allows you to create rules without any coding knowledge. We also provide tutorials to guide you through the process.

faqList.header: Can I use conditional logic to hide or show multiple fields at once?
faqList.body: Yes! You can set rules to hide or show multiple fields based on a single response, allowing you to streamline the user experience and keep your forms tidy and relevant.

faqList.header: What happens if a user changes their answer after conditional logic has been applied?
faqList.body: Our platform automatically updates the form in real-time. If a user changes their response, the form will dynamically adjust, showing or hiding fields based on the new answer, ensuring they always see the most relevant questions.

faqList.header: Will using conditional logic slow down my form's loading time?
faqList.body: No, using conditional logic does not negatively impact your form’s loading time. Our platform is optimized for performance, ensuring your forms load quickly and function smoothly, even with complex conditional logic in place.

faqList.header: What is a collaborative form?
faqList.body: A collaborative form is a form that lets several people work on it at once. Everyone can add or change information and share ideas, making it great for teams to gather input in one spot.

faqList.header: Do I need this feature?
faqList.body: You might need a collaborative form if you have a team and want everyone to share their ideas easily. It helps you get feedback and make changes together, saving time and improving teamwork.

faqList.header: Can I limit who sees each form?
faqList.body: Yes! With Formester’s “Form Level Access,” you can pick who sees or edits each form, either by adding specific people or entire teams.

faqList.header: How does Formester keep our data safe?
faqList.body: Formester only allows people to access what they can see. You assign roles like Viewer or Editor to make sure sensitive info stays secure.

faqList.header: What if someone leaves the team? Can I remove their access fast?
faqList.body: Absolutely! You can quickly remove them from your organization, which instantly blocks their access to all forms and data.

faqList.header: If I change someone’s role, will it mess up their work?
faqList.body: Not at all! Changing a role updates access immediately. This does not affect current work, so it’s easy to make changes.

faqList.header: Is this available in the free plan?
faqList.body: No, the Form Access Management feature is only available for Business and Enterprise users. See our pricing to learn more.

itemList.description: Without checking, people can enter fake emails. This wastes your time and fills your list with useless contacts.

itemList.title: Reduce Spam
itemList.description: Bots and spam accounts often submit fake emails. This clogs your form entries. Validation helps filter them out.

itemList.title: Prevent Communication Issues
itemList.description: Mistyped emails mean people miss out on important updates, reminders, or offers. Validation catches these mistakes right away.

itemList.title: Lower Bounce Rates
itemList.description: Invalid emails bounce back when you try to contact them. This damages your email reputation, making it harder to reach real customers.

itemList.title: Save Time on Data Cleanup
itemList.description: A list with bad emails needs regular cleaning, which takes time. Validation keeps your list cleaner from the start.

itemList.title: Improve Trust and Engagement
itemList.description: When you validate emails, your messages go to the right people. This helps build trust and keeps users engaged.

faqList.header: What if a user accidentally enters an invalid email?
faqList.body: If the email is invalid, the form asks them to check the email format before submitting. This helps them easily fix any typos.

faqList.header: Does validation stop all spam?
faqList.body: It significantly reduces spam but can’t stop every instance. Pair it with other tools like CAPTCHA for even better security.

faqList.header: Will validation affect conversion rates?
faqList.body: Not much! Most users expect email validation and see it as a quality measure, making them more likely to trust your form.

faqList.header: How is validation different from verification?
faqList.body: Validation checks that an email has the correct format and may be real. Verification goes a step further, confirming the email actually exists and is in use.

faqList.header: How do I know TrustedForm certificates are legitimate?
faqList.body: TrustedForm certificates capture real-time data, including user IP addresses, browsers, and timestamps, ensuring that every lead is verified. These details provide legally recognized proof of consent, making them highly reliable.
faqList.body_markdown: TrustedForm certificates capture real-time data, including user IP addresses, browsers, and timestamps, ensuring that every lead is verified. These details provide legally recognized proof of consent, making them highly reliable.

faqList.header: Will using TrustedForm slow down my form’s performance?
faqList.body: No, TrustedForm runs in the background without affecting load time. It seamlessly integrates with Formester, ensuring a smooth user experience.

faqList.header: Is TrustedForm necessary if I already use CAPTCHA or other spam filters?
faqList.body: Yes. CAPTCHA prevents bots, but TrustedForm goes further by verifying human leads, providing compliance proof, and filtering out invalid submissions.
faqList.body_markdown: Yes. CAPTCHA prevents bots, but TrustedForm goes further by verifying human leads, providing compliance proof, and filtering out invalid submissions.

faqList.header: What happens if a lead disputes their consent?
faqList.body: You can present the TrustedForm certificate as proof of consent, reducing disputes and protecting your business from legal risks.
faqList.body_markdown: You can present the TrustedForm certificate as proof of consent, reducing disputes and protecting your business from legal risks.

faqList.header: Do I need a developer to set up TrustedForm in Formester?
faqList.body: No, enabling TrustedForm is as simple as toggling an option in the integrations tab—no coding required.
faqList.body_markdown: No, enabling TrustedForm is as simple as toggling an option in the integrations tab—no coding required.

faqList.header: How does TrustedForm help with compliance?
faqList.body: It helps you meet legal standards like TCPA and CASL by proving users voluntarily shared their data, reducing compliance risks.
faqList.body_markdown: It helps you meet legal standards like TCPA and CASL by proving users voluntarily shared their data, reducing compliance risks.

faqList.header: Can I export TrustedForm certificates?
faqList.body: Yes, you can securely access and share certificates via a web URL, making it easy to provide proof when needed.
faqList.body_markdown: Yes, you can securely access and share certificates via a web URL, making it easy to provide proof when needed.

faqList.header: Will this increase my conversion rates?
faqList.body: Yes, by filtering out fake leads and ensuring data accuracy, your sales team can focus on high-quality prospects, leading to better conversions.
faqList.body_markdown: Yes, by filtering out fake leads and ensuring data accuracy, your sales team can focus on high-quality prospects, leading to better conversions.

faqList.header: What if I don’t want to verify every lead?
faqList.body: You can selectively use TrustedForm for critical forms where compliance and lead quality matter the most.
faqList.body_markdown: You can selectively use TrustedForm for critical forms where compliance and lead quality matter the most.

itemList.title: Enable the Feature
itemList.description:
- Go to **Settings** in the Formester dashboard.

- Navigate to **Advanced Settings** and toggle on **Connect Form to PDF**.

- Click **Save Settings** to apply changes.

- After enabling, the **PDF Editor** tab will appear in the builder.
itemList.description_markdown:
- Go to **Settings** in the Formester dashboard.

- Navigate to **Advanced Settings** and toggle on **Connect Form to PDF**.

- Click **Save Settings** to apply changes.

- After enabling, the **PDF Editor** tab will appear in the builder.

itemList.title: Create & Upload a PDF Template
itemList.description:
- Design a generic **PDF template** using any tool.

- In Formester, go to the PDF Editor tab and click **Upload PDF**.

- This will store the PDF inside Formester for customization.

itemList.title: Customize the Template & Save
itemList.description:
- Add form fields to the blank spaces in the PDF.

- Click on any field to edit properties like font size, color, and style.

- Use the **@** sign to link fields with form responses.

- Click Save Template.
itemList.description_markdown:
- Add form fields to the blank spaces in the PDF.

itemList.title: Download the Custom PDF
itemList.description:
- Go to the Results tab after a submission.

- Click the three dots next to the response.

- Select Download PDF.

- The PDF will include the user’s answers, replacing the default template.

Now, every time someone submits a form, their responses will be placed into your custom PDF instead of Formester’s default format!

testimonials.name: Bogdan Arsenie
testimonials.comment: At Rumie we use Formester to get feedback from our educators and volunteers. It's intuitive, fast and easy to share.

testimonials.name: Dr. Michele Ross
testimonials.comment: I'm migrating my forms from Paperform, where I've been a user for over 4 years. Loving the software so far! I've already replaced Paperform form embeds & popups on my sites & my husband's websites with Formester forms

testimonials.name: Thibaud Martinez
testimonials.comment: I really enjoy Formester. It’s clean and straight-forward and it does well, what it is supposed to do.

testimonials.name: Costanza Casullo
testimonials.comment: Formester is simple enough for non-developers and sophisticated enough for developers. I'd say being able to choose between simplicity and complexity is one of this product's strengths. In addition, the founder is available to answer questions and doubts, which does not happen every day.

testimonials.name: Deanna Bugalski
testimonials.comment: I was searching for a long time for a product I could use to send newsletters and surveys to my database. I tried so many different types of software and I found many of them difficult to use and slow to learn how to operate. But Formester was super easy to set up, and the usability is seamless! I highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Jilson
testimonials.comment: Formester is really easy to use and an exceptional alternative for Typeform. We use it for call for papers, lead registrations, feedback and surveys and it cannot be simpler.

faqList.header: How to get a notification that someone submitted a form?
faqList.body: Enable form notifications in settings and add recipient emails to receive alerts instantly.
faqList.body_markdown: Enable form notifications in settings and add recipient emails to receive alerts instantly.

faqList.header: What is a form submission notification?
faqList.body: It’s an automatic email alert sent to your inbox when someone submits your form or a survey.
faqList.body_markdown: It’s an automatic email alert sent to your inbox when someone submits your form or a survey.

faqList.header: Can I send notifications to multiple recipients?
faqList.body: Yes! You can add multiple email addresses to ensure your team stays updated.
faqList.body_markdown: Yes! You can add multiple email addresses to ensure your team stays updated.

faqList.header: Will I receive notifications if my form is embedded on a website?
faqList.body: Yes, you’ll get notified no matter where your form is shared or embedded.
faqList.body_markdown: Yes, you’ll get notified no matter where your form is shared or embedded.

faqList.header: Do notifications work on mobile devices?
faqList.body: Yes! You can receive alerts on your phone, tablet, or any device with email access.
faqList.body_markdown: Yes! You can receive alerts on your phone, tablet, or any device with email access.
